subject: HTML
question: As you learned, forms are able to send files to a server. Write the code to create 2 file picker inputs that will have the usual attributes (id, name, etc.) set as "file", and for the first one it will allow to send multiple elements, and the second one will allow to capture the files from the camera. The picker will acept images.
answer:
<input type="file" name="file" id="file" accept="image/*" multiple>
<input type="file" accept="image/*;capture=camera">
